resources.string: 1. After flip a coin to decide who starts first, at the beginning of each round, you and your alternate between who rolls the dice.\n2. You can roll up to 3 times. You can choose which dice you want to keep and which you want to re-roll between rolling turns.

Players can choose one God Favor to invoke, then reveal to each other their choice. God Favors are invoked in order of priority. God Favors with the same Priority are paid and applied according to the players’ order. When a God Favor is invoked, its offering

is presented, and its effect is granted. Most God Favors are invoked after both players choose them and before the Resolution phase. Exception: if it is specifically stated it in their effect description, they are invoked after the Resolution phase. If a player does not have enough
pieces for the offering when the God Favor they chose is invoked, its effects are not granted.

The dice rolled by both players are resolved against each other: damage is dealt or blocked, and tokens are gained or stolen. Rounds are played until one player reduces the Health of the other to 0.\n1.Each dice faced with a golden trim earns 1
token during the Resolution Phase.\n2.Axes and Arrows are resolved and their unblocked damage applied. The player who rolled first this round also attacks first.\n3.Each Hand steals 1
token from the opponent.\nIf no player has reached 0 HP, they switch up their order (second becomes first) and another Round is played.
Each Axe and Arrow deals 1 damage, Each helmet can block 1 axe and each shield can block 1 arrow and each hand can steal 1
During the God Favor phase, Players can choose a God Favor. Then, in order of Priority, Players offer
tokens to invoke a God Favor and apply its effect.
Reduce the effect of a God Favor invoked by the opponent this round.
Sacrifice any number of your Health tokens. Destroy opponent\'s ⌘ per Health sacrificed.
Each ⌘ spent by your opponent heals you.
After the Resolution phase, sacrifice any number of your health tokens. Gain ⌘ per health token sacrificed.
Gain ⌘ for each die that rolled hand.
Gain ⌘ for each damage dealt to you this round.
Ban opponent\'s dice for the round.
Reroll any of your or your opponent\'s dice.
Destroy opponent\'s ⌘ for each die that rolled arrow.
Add arrow to each die that rolled arrow.
Each axe damage dealt to the opponent heals you.
Add to the total of whichever die face is in majority.
Add helmet for each die that rolled helmet. Add shield for each die that rolled shield.
Heal Health for each attack you block.
Your arrow ignore the opponent\'s shield.
Deal damage to the opponent after the Resolution phase.
